text: @realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs A health emergency was declared within 2 weeks and a vaccine was developed in 7 months . The mortality rate was also no comparison to the Coronavirus . .002 % compared to 3 % but go ahead and keep dissembling and failing . It's just what you do.
